# Five Safes {#sec-five-safes .unnumbered}

ECHILD is available to researchers through the Office for National Statistics Secure Research Service (ONS SRS) [42], which follows the Five Safes Framework.

| 1. Safe People | 2. Safe Projects | 3. Safe Settings | 4. Safe Outputs | 5. Safe Data |
|:--------------:||:--------------:||:--------------:||:--------------:||:--------------:|
| Accredited Researchers | Ethical & benefits public | Secure technology | Non-identifiable outputs | Use de-identified data |
